summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1355, for the improvement of Boylston Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from Thomas Street to the south line of the Supplemental Plat of A. Pontius' Addition to the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 15003 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
